snippet: Resident Evil 6, an ambitious mediocrity, is a 25-hour adventure set across four globe-spanning campaigns in a near future featuring a worldwide outbreak of bioterrorism.
abstract: Stephen Totilo reviews video game Resident Evil 6 from Capcom.
lead_paragraph: Resident Evil 6, an ambitious mediocrity, is a 25-hour adventure set across four globe-spanning campaigns in a near future featuring a worldwide outbreak of bioterrorism.

headline.seo: Resident Evil 6, by Capcom, Makes Its Debut
headline.main: It’s Bioterrorism, and Even the President’s a Zombie
headline.print_headline: It’s Bioterrorism, and Even the President’s a Zombie
